summary: Website project for a clothing brand.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist fashion brand logo, monochrome, clean geometric mark (brand-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Fashion editorial hero banner with neutral tones and ample negative space (hero-banner.dim_1920x900.png)
- Lifestyle clothing photography-style banner with soft lighting and modern streetwear vibe (lifestyle-banner.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive clothing brand website with core marketing pages: Home, Collections (product listing), About, and Contact, with a persistent header navigation and footer across all pages.
Implement Home page sections suitable for a clothing brand: hero banner with headline and call-to-action, featured collections/products, and a brand values/USP section.

Implement a Collections page that displays a browsable product grid (using a simple in-app dataset) and a Product Details view (modal or separate page) showing images, description, price, sizes, and an "Add to Cart" button (cart can be client-side only).

Implement a Contact page with a contact form (name, email, message) that performs client-side validation and provides a clear success state without requiring a backend (e.g., using a mailto link or on-screen submission confirmation).
Apply a cohesive, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a fashion/clothing brand (colors, typography, spacing, components) and enforce it consistently across all pages and components.

Add generated brand visuals as static assets and use them in the UI (logo in header, hero image on Home, and at least one supporting lifestyle/banner image). Store assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for a clothing brand.
